CustomField.description: Programmatically specifies how work orders are generated when more than one asset is associated with the Maintenance Plan. The value in this field will auto-populate a field of the same name on the Maintenance Plan.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Programmatically specifies how work orders are generated when more than one asset is associated with the Maintenance Plan. The value in this field will auto-populate a field of the same name on the Maintenance Plan.
CustomField.label: Work Order Generation Method

value.label: One work order line item per asset
